page.title: 13 RELIGION
page.content: THE AREA WE STUDIED IS A MULTIFAITH SOCIETY.THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE ARE CHRISTIANS.THEY BELIEVE THAT JESUS IS THE SON OF GOD.USUALLY THEY ATTEND CHURCH ON SUNDAYS,AND SOMETIMES OTHER DAYS.EACH CHURCH HAS ITS OWN CLERGYMAN WHO MAY BE CALLED A RECTOR,VICAR,PRIEST ,MINISTER OR PASTOR.THE ALTAR IS THE MOST SACRED PART OF THE CHURCH,AND IT IS HERE THE CHRISTIANS COME DURING THE HOLY COMMUNION SERVICE.BAPTISM IS USED TO BAPTISE BABIES.THE BABY IS GIVEN A CHRISTIAN NAME AND IS WELCOMED TO THE CHURCH.WHEN THE BABY IS BAPTISED IT CAN'T MAKE ITS OWN PROMISE,SO IT MAKES THE PROMISE WHEN IT IS OLDER.DURING THE YEAR,SPECIAL SERVICES ARE HELD.AT HARVEST TIME THERE IS A HARVEST FESTIVAL.AT CHRISTMAS THERE IS A CAROL SERVICE AND AT EASTER THERE IS A SERVICE TO CELEBRATE JESUS RISING FROM THE DEAD.
